Common commands for python

Jan 4, 2022

记录Python常用的commands

  • 安装pyenv 和Python version $ brew install pyenv $ pyenv install 3.6.5 $ pyenv global 3.6.5

  • 安装并指定一个虚拟环境

    $ pip install virtualenv $ mkdir ~/venv && virtualenv ~/venv/pycharm3.6.5 $ source ~/venv/pycharm3.9.1/bin/activate

  • 查找具体安装的lib信息

    $ pip show Appium-Python-Client

    Name: Appium-Python-Client
    Version: 0.28
    Summary: Python client for Appium 1.5
    Home-page: http://appium.io/
    Author: Isaac Murchie
    Author-email: isaac@saucelabs.com
    License: Apache 2.0
    Location: /Users/vicky/venv/pycharm3.6.5/lib/python3.6/site-packages
    Requires: selenium
    Required-by:

  • list all of the cron jobs $ crontab -l

  • edit cron jobs $ crontab -e

  • 查看已安装ruby 版本号 rbenv install --list

0 */4 * * *

          • command(s) ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ | | | | | allowed values | | | | | ——- | | | | —– Day of week (0 - 7) (Sunday=0 or 7) | | | ——- Month (1 - 12) | | ——— Day of month (1 - 31) | ———– Hour (0 - 23) ————- Minute (0 - 59)
